icon.tooltip: Select an icon file. You can also type an icon name into the entry box

icon-symbolic.description: Use a symbolic icon instead of a full color icon
icon-symbolic.tooltip: This only affects icon names. If you specify a file, this option is not used.

activate-on-hover.tooltip: Activate the menu by hovering the mouse over it

show-favorites.tooltip: Show your selected favorites on the left side of the menu

show-system-buttons.tooltip: Show the system buttons (lock, logout and shutdown) on the left side of the menu

show-places.tooltip: Show an extra category containing bookmarks and places

show-recent.tooltip: Show an extra category containing recently used files and folders

show-appinfo-title.description: Show the title of the selected application
show-appinfo-title.tooltip: Show the title of the currently selected application

show-appinfo-description.description: Show the description of the selected application
show-appinfo-description.tooltip: Show the description of the currently selected application

show-appinfo-description-multiline.tooltip: Show the description on multiple lines if too long

appinfo-align-right.tooltip: Align the title & description of the currently selected application to the right

searchbox-position.tooltip: Move the search field to the top or bottom position. App-Info will be placed at the opposite position.
